title: Authors and Citation
text: Treischl E (2024). gist: Manage GitHub Gist. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://edgar-treischl.github.io/gist/index.html.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gist: Manage GitHub Gist},   author = {Edgar Treischl},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://edgar-treischl.github.io/gist/index.html}, }

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: gist package provides set functions work GitHub Gist API. allows create, read, update delete gists. Moreover, provides shiny app interact gists. app installed addin can accessed via RStudio addin menu.

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: can install development version gist like : order retrieve data, need provide GitHub API token (github_api) keyring package. Use key_set() function code save token:
code: devtools::install_github("edgar-treischl/gist") #Save GitHub API token as github_api keyring::key_set(service = "github_api")

title: Manage GitHub Gist
text: Go addin menu use following code open gist app:

title: Create Github Gist files — create_gist
text: function create_gist() creates new GitHub Gist file.

title: Create Github Gist files — create_gist
text: name name file. code String code Gist. description String code description.

title: Delete Github Gist files — delete_gist
text: careful: function delete_gist() deletes GitHub Gists file.

title: Copy Github Gist files — get_gist
text: filename file name gist GitHub account (see gistfiles) description TRUE, function returns description Gist.

what: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
title: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin
text: gist_addin() creates shiny miniui app manage gists. Pick gist, press copy insert button code insert current document Furthermore can create delete gists well.

title: Manage GitHub Gists via the gist addin — gist_addin

what: Explore all GitHub Gist files — gistfiles
title: Explore all GitHub Gist files — gistfiles
Explore all GitHub Gist files — gistfiles
Explore all GitHub Gist files — gistfiles
